channel.title: Pages on Paul Knopf
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Paul Knopf

item.title: About me
item.description: What I do I am a software engineer for a medical device company building products on many platforms. From front-end web applications, to embedded Linux devices, and everything in between. Why I do it My first webpage was a geocities page. I would scan through gifs/stickers and absolutely position (drag-and-drop) them all over my home page, add random javascript snippets for fancy tickers and blinking colors, etc. I channeled my passion into developing an “actual” website.
